home.welcome: Hello, I am Fabian and I develop fab webs.

about.firstParagraph: Hello! I'm Fabian Lopez a Full Stack JavaScript Developer who loves creating efficient, fabulous websites. My skills span Node.js, SQL and no-SQL databases, React, Next.js, and Svelte. But I don't stop thereâ€”I'm always eager to learn new technologies to use the best tools for the job.
about.secondParagraph: My journey has been rich and varied. I managed a transportation company for seven years and earned a Business Administration degree in a new country and a different language. These experiences, coupled with my passion for web development, allow me to understand both the technical and business aspects of every project.
